item.title: Bouncing Ball
item.description: Hey all, here is my first animation project as promised. It is (drum roll) a bouncing ball! I know it is not terribly exciting and, like a said before, my work is of amateur level right now (which makes sense since I am just starting out). However, animating a bouncing ball is a good first exercise for someone learning animation as it teaches principles of timing, spacing and squash & stretch. Instead of focusing on draftsmanship a student can just focus on motion and animation. At least, that is what the people who know tell me and I am inclined to believe them.
